description: Game Editor is the open source game design software that gives you the power to create the games of your dreams in a simple interface and a basic version of the C language, and unlike other game creation tools it gives you the chance to get and change the source code of the game creator and design and develop 2D games for personal computers as well as mobile devices.
notes: Game Editor is the open source game design software that gives you the power to create the games of your dreams in a simple interface and a basic version of the C language, and unlike other game creation tools it gives you the chance to get and change the source code of the game creator and design and develop 2D games for personal computers as well as mobile devices.
